game_description: The most important features of our Chess: * It has 10 different levels of difficulty * Hints are available to show the most advantageous moves * In the case of a mistake, you can use an undo option * It has challenges with hundreds of chess puzzles. Mini-game and Chess Puzzles When you don't have time or energy for a full game, solve chess puzzles. The puzzles are quick tasks of giving your opponent a checkmate, in a limited number of moves. 10 levels of difficulty Are you a chess master or are you just a beginner? Regardless of that, you will find the level suitable for your chess skills. Choose from 10 different difficulty levels, train tactics and win! Undoing movements Have you made a mistake or want to try another tactic? Nothing simpler. Use the Undo button and win! Hints If you need a hint on how to best make your next move, use the Hint.
Languages: English, French (France), German, Italian, Norwegian (Nynorsk), Polish, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Turkish
review_1: Just wasted $4.99 on an app that it incredibly difficult to work. SO frustrating. There is a tutorial "cassette" but no instructions on how to play it. In the meantime, I have no clue how I'm supposed to move the pieces (I've tried every conceivable way). And now it looks as if I'm screwed in terms of getting a refund from Occulus. Live and learn. Prior to this, I had only gotten 3 apps. They all work OK, but I'll probably never get another one after this experience. BEWARE!
review_2: Very disappointed that there is no multiplayer
review_3: I spent maybe 4 or 5 hours playing this so far. It is very difficult to move the pieces and to overall control. But if you're on a budget and want to play chess it's decent.
review_4: Very difficult to move pieces to where I want
